page.title: 05HEALTH-CARE cont'd
page.content: {THE PRIVATE DUCHY HOSPITAL} __________________________ Situated in the grounds of Treliske Hospital, is the smaller private Duchy Hospital, built in the past 5 years. Several doctors from Treliske Hospital work part-time with other doctors especially employed only in the Duchy Hospital. The hospital contains an operating theatre, X-ray room, etc. along with other common facilities but also has specialist physiotherapy units. Many patients in the Duchy Hospital come to use these units to help particular medical ailments. _____ Around the hospitals there are large open areas where staff can play tennis, rugby, football and hockey, or go for a walk.
